title: Bugsplat
body: Okay so obviously by the title you know my league isn't working and I'm getting the error that my bugsplat.dll is missing. I have tried redownloading league twice erasing everything off my computer the 2nd time I did it, that didn't work. I tried just downloading the file twice that didn't work. I'm running out of ideas here guys and really need some help.

replies.body: Your pc may not be completely uninstalling League if that .dll still isn't working properly. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with both **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on to make sure you get a fresh install of the client.
